comoJugar.subtitle: Game Guide
comoJugar.description: In Bulls and Cows, one of the oldest and most universal logic games, your mission is to guess a secret number of four unique digits. With each attempt you will receive clues that bring you closer to the solution.

rule2.title: Attempt:
rule2.description: You propose another 4-digit number without repetitions.

rule3.title: Response:
rule3.description: We tell you how many bulls (correct digits in the exact position) and how many cows (correct digits in different position) you got.

detailedExample.title: Detailed example
detailedExample.analysisText: 5 in first position correct, 7 and 2 exist but change places
detailedExample.infoText: Thanks to this information, you can discard digits and locate the correct ones with deductive logic.

expertTips.title: Expert tips
expertTips.tip1: Start with numbers that include distant digits (0–9) to maximize information from the first clue.
expertTips.tip2: Write down each attempt and clue; build a small map of possibilities.
expertTips.tip3: Prioritize discarding digits first to narrow the search range.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your questions about Bulls and Cows
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about the Bulls and Cows game. Everything you need to know to master this fascinating logic game.

whatIsPica.question: What is a cow?
whatIsPica.answer: It is a correct digit that exists in the secret code, but in a different position from the proposed one.

whatIsFija.question: What is a bull?
whatIsFija.answer: It is a correct digit that is in the exact position of the secret code. It is the best clue you can get.

vsMastermind.question: How does "bulls and cows" differ from Mastermind?
vsMastermind.answer: Mastermind uses colored pegs to mark hits, but the mechanics of "bulls" and "cows" is identical to the numerical logic of our game.

howManyDigits.question: How many digits does the secret code have?
howManyDigits.answer: By default it's 4 unique digits, but you can choose between 3 to 6 digits according to your experience level and preference.

canRepeatDigits.question: Can digits be repeated in the secret code?
canRepeatDigits.answer: In classic mode digits don't repeat. However, we offer an advanced mode where repetitions are allowed for greater difficulty.

bestStrategy.question: What is the best strategy to win?
bestStrategy.answer: Start with numbers that have varied digits (like 0, 3, 6, 9) to get maximum information. Write down each attempt and use deductive logic to eliminate possibilities.

minimumAttempts.question: What is the minimum number of attempts to solve the game?
minimumAttempts.answer: Theoretically it's possible to solve it in 1 attempt with a lot of luck, but using logical strategy, an expert player can solve it consistently in 4-6 attempts.

isThereTimeLimit.question: Is there a time limit to play?
isThereTimeLimit.answer: There is no time limit in classic mode. However, we offer a time trial mode for those seeking an additional challenge.
